hero.name: Nurul Afifah Muthoharoh
hero.heading: Hay! I’m Afifah
hero.description: Coding isn't just my job—it's my art. As a woman in programming, I bring ideas to life with creativity, logic, and a little caffeine.

about.title: I'M Available TO Software Development
about.description: I’m a passionate software developer who loves building creative, efficient, and user-friendly digital solutions.

details.title: BUMDes Bogoharjo Web Platform
details.description: A business and information management website for BUMDes Bogoharjo. The system integrates product management, user accounts, and online service information to improve local digitalization.

details.title: Resto Indo – Online Food Ordering App
details.description: A complete online food ordering system featuring menu browsing, cart, payment gateway, and order tracking. Designed to support local restaurants' digital transformation.

details.title: GLOW adalah aplikasi jurnal kesehatan remaja
details.description: A mobile learning app designed to help students learn Javanese dialogue and culture interactively. Includes material, quizzes, and writing exercises with gamified learning experiences.

details.title: News & Information Portal for Vokal Pers
details.description: A responsive online news portal that allows Vokal pers admins to post and manage public information easily. Includes tagging, article management, and modern UI.

details.title: G-THOS – Green Technology System Semarang
details.description: A mobile public service app developed for the Semarang government to promote eco-friendly initiatives. Includes features like public profiles, legal resources, and waste management.

details.title: MenTion – Mental Health Education App
details.description: A chat-based application built to educate users about mental health awareness. Provides chat simulation, articles, and health resources using a friendly interface.

details.title: BU DEVI – Bulusari Digital Village
details.description: A smart village mobile service application that allows residents to request digital letters, permits, and reports directly through their phones. Supports e-government initiatives.

details.title: Website Berita – Portal Informasi dan Publikasi
details.description: Sebuah portal berita yang menampilkan berbagai informasi terkini dengan sistem manajemen artikel yang mudah digunakan. Dibangun untuk membantu publikasi digital dengan tampilan modern dan user-friendly.

details.title: Booking Ticket Pendakian – Sistem Pemesanan Online
details.description: Aplikasi web yang memudahkan pengguna untuk memesan tiket pendakian secara online. Dilengkapi fitur jadwal pendakian, pembayaran online, dan konfirmasi otomatis.

details.title: Web Booking Makeup – Layanan Pemesanan Makeup Online
details.description: Sebuah website untuk memesan jasa makeup secara online. Pengguna dapat memilih makeup artist, menentukan jadwal, dan melakukan pemesanan langsung dengan tampilan modern dan profesional.

details.title: Web Pemesanan – Sistem Pemesanan Online Terpadu
details.description: Website pemesanan online serbaguna yang memungkinkan pelanggan melakukan pemesanan produk atau layanan dengan mudah. Dibangun dengan tampilan interaktif dan sistem backend yang kuat.

allExperience.company: Easy Build Your App with Android Studio
allExperience.companyDescription: Conducted extensive research on Android Studio, app development techniques, and best practices to provide up-to-date information. Authored in-depth tutorials and examples to guide readers through building Android apps from scratch.

Developed RESTful APIs for web and mobile integration, enhancing performance and scalability. Built a custom UI library for better code reuse and developer productivity. Implemented backend services using Node.js and Express for efficient data management.

allExperience.company: Bangkit Academy by Google, GoTo, & Traveloka
allExperience.companyDescription: Completed a comprehensive curriculum on Android app development, covering Java, Kotlin, MVVM architecture, and Firebase integration. Built and deployed Android applications following best industry practices.

Founder and lead developer at Ladang IT, a freelance software development service. Responsible for building custom web and mobile applications for clients using modern frameworks. Focused on delivering efficient, user-friendly, and scalable digital solutions while managing projects independently from planning to deployment.
Responsible for developing and maintaining company web applications using modern technologies. Collaborating with designers and backend teams to deliver responsive, efficient, and scalable solutions.

allEducation.description: Studied computer networking, hardware maintenance, and system administration. Developed foundational skills in programming and IT infrastructure.

Focused on teaching and educational technology while actively practicing software and web development. Experienced in guiding students in IT subjects, creating digital learning media, and developing real-world applications as part of practical teaching.

allAward.title: Finalist of Semarang City Bappeda Krenova Competition 2021
allAward.description: Selected as one of the top innovative projects in Semarang City.

allAward.title: Passed the 2022 Innovation Talent Program Funding
allAward.description: Received funding support for innovative student research.

allAward.title: Indonesian Thematic Robot Contest 2022, 2023
allAward.description: Participated and represented campus in the national robotics competition.

allAward.title: Passed Funding for Innovative Work Student Creativity Program 2023
allAward.description: Awarded funding under the Student Creativity Program (PKM) for technological innovation.

sectionHeading.subTitle: Always available for freelancing if the right project comes along, Feel free to contact me.
